channel.title: Need a good source that is easy to code
channel.description:
Ok so im starting a new server and i want a souce that is easy to code, like adding silabsoft items, making mods/admins/co owers/owner easy, stuff like that, and if someone has a server that is started and wont use it please send it to me ty
OR if someone will code for me that will be great, its hamachi, srry cant portforward

item.title: Need a good source that is easy to code
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:10, topic:186044”][quote author=3rd_age link=topic=248434.msg2085949#msg2085949 date=1204548012]
ROFL this is my new acc i lost my old pass you fucking noob! just go fuck off and leave me alone
if u knew who i was… boy u wouldnt be sayin that
[/quote]
Who are you? Someone with 200 rep!!! oman, u r extremly l33t[/quote]

If you knew who Yz was, you wouldn’t be saying that. So STFU and fuck off.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a good source that is easy to code
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“3rd_age, post:6, topic:186044”][quote author=Camranrev link=topic=248434.msg2085922#msg2085922 date=1204545393]
Ah thatys ok ill help you there to compile you must right click on it then edit then replace with this

@echo off title Server Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

To run you edit and replace all with:

@echo off color 0a title Project Czar java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Hope i helped ++rep if i did plz
[/quote]Thanks for help, it worked, i’d rep if i could but i cant srry

[quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=248434.msg2085938#msg2085938 date=1204546764]

Ah thatys ok ill help you there to compile you must right click on it then edit then replace with this

@echo off title Server Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

To run you edit and replace all with:

@echo off color 0a title Project Czar java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Hope i helped ++rep if i did plz

GTFO
[/quote]why dont you just fuck off no one needs your shit[/quote]
stfu i have 13 rep i am better than u

Read full topic
